content: Home | Mysite top of pageProf. Dr. Henrik LeopoldI’m Henrik Leopold — a scientist, speaker, and passionate advocate for using AI to make organizations and their processes smarter. Together with my research group, I develop AI-driven methods that uncover hidden patterns in how businesses operate, leading to insights that drive real, tangible improvements. I enjoy working closely with industry partners to solve real-world problems and turn research into impact. PublicationsI have co-authored over 100 peer-reviewed publications across books, journals, and conference proceedings. My work combines technical innovation with practical relevance and aims to help organizations better understand, optimize, and transform the way they operate.Access PapersExpert TalksAs a speaker, I frequently talk about the real-world impact of AI, automation, and the evolving nature of work. I focus on making complex developments accessible and relevant to decision-makers.
